/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A yellow sign with a black arrow pointing to the right can be seen on the right side of the street, possibly indicating a direction or a point of interest. The street itself is lined with power lines, a common sight in many cities. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. The image does not contain any text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the street serving as a dividing line between the greenery and the cityscape. The image does not contain any people or moving objects, giving it a serene and peaceful atmosphere.
